derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Tupi-Guarani tipioca, from tipi dregs + og, ok squeeze out

entry.def: Tapioca is a food consisting of white grains, rather like rice, which come from the cassava plant.

means.word_mean: 1. granular preparation of cassava starch used to thicken especially puddings
